Articles.Content:
Hi

I'v just started to get interested about re texturing and have some problems...

no the part (Orion module) s from Bobcat america pack http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-20-x-american-pack-0-1/

I have my texture about set up, but i have no idea why mu bump map keeps getting so low quality and grainy. I would appreciate if some one could help me with this problem

so the texture is fine but my bump map keeps messing things up no mater how big i make the resolution:cool:
Export your bump/normal texture from unity *uncompressed*. Are you using rbray's memory reduction mod?
actually i'm just useing photoshop and .png files as textures and the nividia plugin for photoshop to make the bump maps. but seams il have to look into unity to solve this. TY for the hep

-here are the pictures of the textured work

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited January 14, 2014 by tabaal2
I *think* that might be due to the engine expecting a normal but getting a grayscale bump map or vice versa.
SSbump Generator will convert a bump map to a normal for you and does much better than unity's built in conversion.
